attributes.action: Award Captain Tom Moore a knighthood before his 100th birthday.
attributes.background: Captain Tom Moore is a national hero helping to raise millions of pounds for our NHS workers. He has brought out the very best of our national spirit, so deserves to be knighted before his 100th birthday by the end of April. The nation is behind this, so let's reward this great man.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
